name: Gotta catch'em all
description:
GOTTA CATCH'EM ALL 🔴GOAL🔴

 In this revolutionary new shooter game, 🐖🦄🦝🦊 become Ash Ketchum the best pokemon trainer in  his little home town.  After getting his first pokeballs, ash witnesses a bunch of pokemon flying near his village, so he decides he's gonna catch em all

🔴CONTROLS 🔴
  • Space     = throw pokeballs
  • ←↑↓→   = movement
🔴CREDITS 🔴
  • Karl Fayeton
  • Jonathan Frowein
